title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet over medium heat until crispy, about 5-7 minutes.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan cheese, and a generous amount of black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain the spaghetti.
Remove skillet from heat and add the hot pasta to the pancetta.
Quickly pour in the egg mixture, tossing constantly. Add pasta water gradually to create a creamy sauce.
Season with salt and more pepper. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and parsley.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 1 tbsp tikka masala for at least 1 hour.
Heat oil in a large pan and cook chicken until golden. Set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onion until soft, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic, ginger, and remaining tikka masala. Cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes until sauce thickens.
Blend the sauce until smooth, then return to pan.
Add cream and cooked chicken. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Wash and thoroughly dry romaine lettuce.
Tear lettuce into bite-sized pieces and place in a large bowl.
Add Caesar dressing and toss to coat evenly.
Add croutons and half of the Parmesan cheese.
Toss gently to combine.
Top with remaining Parmesan and anchovies if using.
Serve immediately with lemon wedges.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef in crispy taco shells with fresh toppings and zesty sauce.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with 1/2 cup water.
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens.
Warm taco shells according to package instructions.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
Add sour cream and salsa to taste.
Serve immediately while warm.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with aromatic sauces and spices.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add broccoli and carrots, stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Add bell peppers and snap peas, cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and toss to coat vegetables.
Cook for another 2 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Garnish with sesame seeds and serve over rice.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Decadent chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served warm with vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: Butter and cocoa powder for ramekins
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Butter and dust 4 ramekins with cocoa powder.
Melt chocolate and butter together in a double boiler or microwave.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, egg yolks, and sugar until thick and pale.
Fold melted chocolate into egg mixture.
Gently fold in flour until just combined.
Divide batter among prepared ramekins.
Bake for 12-14 minutes until edges are firm but centers are soft.
Let cool for 1 minute, then invert onto plates. Serve with ice cream.
